FuncDef: This command configures a destination address range to be used as a SAP QoS policy match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: The IPv6 prefix for the IP match criterion in hex digits (applies to the 7750 SR and 7950 XRS). Values-ipv6-address x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces).
The IPv6 prefix length for the ipv6-address expressed as a decimal integer (applies to the 7750 SR and 7950 XRS). Values-1 to 128.
Eight 16-bit hexadecimal pieces representing bit match criteria. Values-x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces).
